idea:
Calantha Biotech Pvt. Ltd. is a team of professionals who are specialists in anti-microbial testing solutions for textile fabrics, polymers, paints and gels. We have expertise in fabric testing as per AATCC, ASTM, European Pharmacopeia & JIS testing standards.

We also offer project-based services for enzyme immobilization, enzyme development, testing, profiling services and & other applications.

Our laboratory in Mumbai is designed as per ISO-IEC 17025:2017 and our documentation & reporting standards are in accordance with ISO guidelines. We are committed to providing the highest quality testing with lowest turnaround times.

We also provide eco-friendly alternatives to textile industry through consulting services in areas of effluent treatment of textile waste, pre-treatment of textiles and development of anti-microbial textiles.
name: CALANTHA BIOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Arch Analytics helps businesses launch AI-powered solutions faster. For forward-looking CXOs who want to make their products & services intelligent Arch Analytics is an AI solutions company that builds end to end custom AI solutions. Unlike traditional analytics companies, Arch Analytics provides a combination of AI & software engineering expertise, fast turnaround time and above all impeccable customer experience. With 95% customer satisfaction score and clients such as Nova Scotia bank, Freightos and Rocket Internet, Arch Analytics is your on-demand data science SWAT team.
name: ACUVEA ANALYTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Social Network for people to articulate Views and Opinions
name: PLAY MY OPINION PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
MINK is a one stop solution for all your high ­quality fabric
maintenance requirement. Not just fabric, but it also caters to Shoes, Bag, Carpets & Soft Toys. The idea is to own/control everything which directly affects consumer experience in order to maintain consistent quality and  outsource everything else, hence  MINK owns/control following:

● Quality Parameters and Processes, Facility Processes.
● Hiring of the facility/processing unit labor and training.
● Logistics (Fleet management and Delivery Boys)
● Customer Support, Grievances, and Education.
● Customer acquisition.

MINK outsources the following :
● The facility infrastructure and labour cost.
● Van for logistics and driver. (Delivery boy is on payroll)
The semi­asset light model and above distribution of assets and responsibilities enable us to scale our business at a much  faster rate without compromising on quality, maintaining good margins and escaping huge CapEx. It will be closer to a Franchisee ­Owned ­Company­ Operated (FOCO) business model.
name: Craftmink Technology Pvt. Ltd.

idea:
Alt Culture is a one of a kind eco-system focused on supporting and furthering the arts and technology. It  supports co-working spaces for start-ups, creative entrepreneurs and the creative community, a workshop and events platform to support educators with classes cross disciplines for the mind and the body, a performance venue to showcase budding and established talent and a cafe to eat, drink, unwind and work out of. We promote and support an unbiased and open culture and we value your energy and input and help your great ideas come to life by creating the environment where you can meet, collaborate and 
inspire each other.
name: Alt Culture Entertainment Pvt Ltd

idea: We are HR management recruitment and consultancy company, formed to provide man power solution to Big Retailers, Wholesalers for their man power requirement. We are currently working on creation of our specialized job portal.
name: Retailsxpert

idea: Revolux Solutions is a technology solutions company from Mumbai, developing cutting edge software technology products and offering technology solutions services. It has developed a revolutionary retail technology platform for small and unorganized retail business to transform and modernize their offline retail operations, and expanding their business footprints into online e-Commerce operation in a matter of minutes. Thus allowing small retail business to offer modern digitized ecommerce channel to reach out and grow their customer base. There are several other products developed for Personal Safety, Security and in Healthcare space. Further as a technology solutions service provider, Revolux Solutionas has been recognized as a promising Mobile App Startup by CIO Review publication and Revolux’s expansive portfolio of offerings includes Mobile Application and Web Application Development, Offshore Product Development, Project Management Services, SEO, SEM, Website Development, Digital Marketing Services, Blockchain and IoT Development, AI Bot capabilities, Best Practices and Innovation Management Consulting and eCommerce services.
name: REVOLUX SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are a trader and basically we will focus on export & Import too.
name: Mahinams Import & Export LLP.

idea:
We are a startup with chain of Tafe's (Tea Cafe) with 2 operational stores in Mumbai at Kalbadevi and Pydohine (Zaveri Bazaar) area, and planning to open more stores soon. 


Our Story

TPK- Tea by Purohit’s Kitchen
The lifestyle is changing, the market is changing so we are also changing the pattern of doing business, And the day has come where we have come up with an innovative concept of serving and delivering tea.
Mumbai is the financial capital of India and after doing an intensive research here we found that there is no quality maintained when it comes to preparation and serving tea, still people have to compromise with the taste, quality and hygiene, there is huge gap between product, service and customer expectations.
To fill that gap we founded TPK-Tea By Purohit’s Kitchen
The quality and consistency of tea is something which we at TPK would never compromise. Our Mission and Vision is to provide you with the premium quality of tea prompt delivery service at your doorstep.
name: TEA BY PUROHITS KITCHEN PRIVATE LIMITED
